name: Pumpkin Seeds
properties: Part of Daily Dozen nuts and seeds
Can be eaten raw or roasted
benefits: Pumpkin seeds are nutrient-dense seeds that provide minerals and healthy fats. Best eaten raw and whole or coarsely chopped rather than as butter for weight-loss acceleration. Part of the optimal weight-loss diet.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - 1 serving of nuts and seeds daily

quotes: Nuts are a great complement to greens to boost the absorption of fat-soluble nutrients, but, ideally, they should be eaten raw and whole or coarsely chopped rather than blended into butters.
